#set ($currentPage = $core_v2_wikiPage.CurrentOrDefault) ## hide this widget if the content is abusive and accessing user does not have permission to review #set ($abusiveContent = false) #set ($abusiveContent = $core_v2_abusiveContent.Get($currentPage.ContentId, $currentPage.ContentTypeId)) #set ($abusiveAndCanReviewAppealsInGroup = false) #if ($abusiveContent && $abusiveContent.IsAbusive) #set ($abusiveAndCanReviewAppeals = $core_v2_abuseAppeal.CanReviewAppealsInApplication($core_v2_wiki.Current.ApplicationId, $core_v2_wiki.ApplicationTypeId)) #if (!$abusiveAndCanReviewAppeals) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #end #set ($deleteCompleteSingleText = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_Delete_Complete_Single')) #set ($deleteCompleteMultipleText = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_Delete_Complete_Multiple')) #if ($abusiveAndCanReviewAppealsInGroup) #set ($deleteCompleteSingleText = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_Delete_Complete_Abusive_Single')) #set ($deleteCompleteMultipleText = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_Delete_Complete_Abusive_Multiple')) #end #set ($canDeleteVersions = false) #set ($canDeleteVersions = $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_wikiPermissions.DeletePage, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ContentId = $currentPage.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $core_v2_wikiPage.ContentTypeId }").IsAllowed) #set ($currentPageSize = 10) #set ($currentPageIndex = $core_v2_ui.GetCurrentPageIndex()) #set ($revisions = $core_v2_wikiPageRevision.List($currentPage.WikiId, "%{PageId = $currentPage.Id, PageIndex = $currentPageIndex, PageSize = $currentPageSize}"))

$currentPage.Title

#if ($revisions && $revisions.Count > 0) #foreach ($revision in $revisions) #each #end
$core_v2_language.GetResource("Wikis_History_Revision") $core_v2_language.GetResource("Wikis_History_Date") $core_v2_language.GetResource("Wikis_History_Author")
#else #end $core_v2_language.GetResource("Wikis_History_CurrentRevision") $core_v2_language.FormatDateAndTime($currentPage.LastModifiedDate) #if ($currentPage.User.ProfileUrl) $currentPage.User.DisplayName #else $currentPage.User.DisplayName #end
#set ($id = "${core_v2_widget.UniqueId('Revision')}-${revision.RevisionNumber}") $core_v2_language.GetResource("Revision") #$revision.RevisionNumber $core_v2_language.FormatDateAndTime($revision.LastModifiedDate) #if ($revision.User.ProfileUrl) $revision.User.DisplayName #else $revision.User.DisplayName #end
$core_v2_ui.Pager($currentPageIndex, $revisions.PageSize, $revisions.TotalCount)
  • #if ($revisions && $revisions.Count > 0) $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_Compare') #if ($canDeleteVersions) $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_Delete') #end #end $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_History_ViewCurrent')
